column4: no on in specific, i just wanted to remind that some of us noobs arent as savy as most of the peeps here trying to help and that if they would ask some basic questions like, for me instance, do you know how to see the cube when you switch between workspaces, i would have said no
but i did not know how to phrase my issue, because like i said, i am very much a noob
well reading the guide I linked you would eliminate many of those issues
reading is required. that is a great resource I linked you to
